1: bcom ldan 'dod chags che//'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang //sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od//de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin
2: zhe na/thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni//khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag mngon bskyed//khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan//
3: sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med//sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces//dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin//de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/yan lag g.yas pas mnyam
4: gnon pas//g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su//de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can//rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso//de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid
5: kyi shes pa yin zhe na/kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na//dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog/kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas//thams cad dbang phyug che ru 'phags//grub
6: rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs//dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag/rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin//de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7: kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams//mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog/so sor rtog la nyi ma ste//bya ba la ni rta mchog dang //chos kyi dbyings la sangs
8: rgyas ni//thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ro dang reg bya de bzhin yang //rdo rje sems
